title: Flight 93 National Memorial: Bus and Motorcoach Groups
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Bus and Motorcoach Groups                Bus and Motorcoach Groups       Notify of a Visit to the Memorial For bus and motorcoach groups, please use our on-line notification scheduler. You will be leaving this website. Please note: Reservations can only be made within 240 days of today's date. If you wish to inquire about a reservation beyond that date, please e-mail the Group Coordinator.  Final Preparations for Your Visit  Be sure to review "Know Before You Go" and Group Frequently Asked Questions Check our current operating hours and seasons Make sure you have the most recent driving directions Download and print park maps  Contact the park office with questions - 814-893-6545
